Happy New Year from Team Upton! Here’s to a successful and prosperous 2020! #MI06 https://t.co/T9naxAOu9O
Merry Christmas! May you and your family have a blessed and cherished day. https://t.co/WasqYeSuRZ

Great time tonight at the annual Vicksburg Christmas Parade with Mary Balkema @BronwynHaltom and the @wmugop! Was honored to be asked to judge all the wonderful floats. Thanks to all who participated and came out to celebrate! #MI06 #TeamUpton https://t.co/b14YuEINQo

HUGE job numbers news today! Our economy continues to grow - unemployment rate is at a 50-year low! We must continue to enable growth in our communities with common sense policies that encourage job creation & keep jobs in the USA 🇺🇸 #JobsJobsJobs #MI06 https://t.co/1ZAtQMRFST
Happy Thanksgiving to you and your family! https://t.co/q6pgpYiUyu
This news is a HUGE WIN for our SW Michigan farmers. We fought for help and now help is on the way. #MI06 https://t.co/XpSXmUczW1

On this Veteran’s Day we honor the generations of brave men and women who have selflessly fought to defend the freedoms that we hold dear. Thank you to all who serve and their families. God Bless! #MI06 https://t.co/Z95vOEVipZ
Great to welcome my friend @jasoninthehouse to the @KalamazooGOP Lincoln Day Dinner tonight! #MI06 https://t.co/rUl6IfDfnS
Tomorrow is Fred and Amey’s Anniversary! Sign the card to wish them them a Happy Anniversary!  SIGN HERE --> https://t.co/C5n9I1ign0 https://t.co/59DCvSueaZ
Great to be with the @wmugop the other night! Appreciate you having me out. Impressive group this year that is eager to get involved! #MI06 https://t.co/L4Vhw0MOS9

St. Joseph was recently ranked as one of the best places to live in America! That’s no surprise. Being born and raised here I’ve always been proud to call this community home. #MI06  https://t.co/qonkFRu9sf https://t.co/2qTFq4HyXx
We will #NeverForget. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/JaqI9j1Mq1

From the @WSJ: "Known to constituents as Fred he has been re-elected 16 times earning a reputation for seeking common ground on thorny issues.  'I don’t feel that I’ve changed. My skin’s a little thicker probably' said Upton."  Read the full story here: https://t.co/SatzSxQ9xL

I spoke with @WSJM about priorities for the fall as Congress returns from the August recess this week. I discussed several issues such as the budget common sense gun reforms and working together to solve the crisis at the border. #MI06  https://t.co/vT2z7qkt22

I was proud to join local leaders in Niles as ground broke for a new $1 billion-dollar natural gas energy site. The new plant will generate power for over 700000 homes and businesses provide cleaner energy and create new jobs for SW Michigan! #MI06  https://t.co/WkHrWpJGxq
Have a safe and happy #LaborDay! https://t.co/91Ad4ckzWc
Great to be with the @wmugop for @BroncoBash 2019. Wonderful to see so many student organizations involved in advocacy all throughout campus. #MI06 https://t.co/SAGkXBZGPb
I am proud to represent the people of southwest Michigan in Congress where we've been working toward bipartisan solutions. And we're just getting started! #MI06 https://t.co/PQiVYQ90An

Opioid and substance abuse affects every demographic. That is why I advocated to secure a critical federal grant for Western Michigan University that would combat the opioid epidemic that is affecting our communities.  https://t.co/DDS9BRfgT7

In Congress I have done everything I can to protect the Great Lakes that is why the Great Lakes Restoration Act of 2019 is so important. This bipartisan piece of legislation will protect the lakes from Asian carp & other harmful species & strengthen the economy of SW Michigan! https://t.co/t0Tl1EZLEx
On this #PurpleHeartDay we honor the brave sacrifices made by the men and women serving in our Armed Forces who have earned a Purple Heart. Thank You for your service. 💜 https://t.co/BhD8lSk2L0

ICYMI: I appeared on @1450whtc for a weekly discussion where I touched on a number of issues such as ending robocalls protecting the Great Lakes & continuing the 9/11 victim’s compensation fund. Tune in to hear what else I am working on for SW Michigan! https://t.co/Vtj7hsby2Y

GREAT NEWS! A bill I co-sponsored to ban robocalls has passed the House. An overwhelming 110 million calls were made into Southwest Michigan alone this year. Sign my petition to let Congress know you're fed up with robocalls! ➡️ https://t.co/myExx3wd2k https://t.co/cz2xOxtIPD

I will always fight for our Michigan farmers. When record spring rainfall severely impacted our state I met with our farmers to hear their concerns & challenges. That is why I supported millions in disaster relief that will benefit farmers who have been impacted by these floods. https://t.co/zjYSThycFm

High-speed broadband internet access is long overdue for our rural communities. This week I was proud to announce southwestern Michigan will receive funds for broadband which will provide safe and reliable access to thousands of homes and businesses.   https://t.co/II00yXKQee

This week marks the 4-year anniversary of the 21st Century Cures Act. I was proud to lead on this bipartisan legislation that is helping find ways to better prevent and treat life-threatening diseases approve new medications and lower health care costs!  https://t.co/CBGyGXOaNz
Great time at the Schoolcraft Lions Club Pancake Breakfast before the Fourth of July Parade! #MI06 https://t.co/k0ar79tL34
Wishing everyone here in Southwest Michigan a safe and happy #IndependenceDay! https://t.co/auw0wIgazd

I spent yesterday touring farms throughout our corner of the state and listening to our local farmers and growers about the serious issues that they are facing. Our farmers need help and we have to deliver. #MI06 https://t.co/PRdYl62sMp
We need bipartisan solutions to keep pipelines safe in Southwest Michigan and across the nation. This is personal to me and it's time we get it done. https://t.co/QGYSHgDEtu

It was an honor to join the @MWCoastChamber to discuss what's being done in Washington to help out SW Michigan - how we're working to grow the economy create jobs and keep our country moving in the right direction. Read more here: https://t.co/5LQlZyyh5l
Proud to see a deal made with Mexico preventing tariffs on so many products that cross our border. Watch my @FoxBusiness interview here:  https://t.co/YRmK5m5qpM
Today we remember the heroes of D-Day who made the ultimate sacrifice 75 years ago defending our country and freedom. Their courage and sacrifice will never be forgotten! https://t.co/AspLIYN6vH

I'm proud of the work we've accomplished by working across the aisle to achieve real results for people here at home. Read my recent op-ed with @RepDebDingell on why we must continue working toward bipartisan solutions in Congress. https://t.co/wfQoC4Y34f

I'm remaining focused on bipartisan solutions to accomplish real results for folks here at home in Southwest MI! I'm proud of the work we've done to lower costs of prescription drugs lift tariffs on aluminum and steel and provide protection for victims of domestic violence. https://t.co/0nshqaUlJl
Wonderful time at the Portage Memorial Day parade honoring and remembering all those who paid the ultimate price for our freedoms. We are truly grateful 🇺🇸 https://t.co/ZYQPIEd5E2

Today and every day we must take time to properly honor those who have pledged their lives to ensure the freedoms that we hold so dear. Together we honor and remember those who have given up their lives for our freedoms! https://t.co/Y03RW8U19m

The Orange Book Transparency Act and the Purple Book Continuity Act of 2019 will require drug makers to submit information about their medications to boost competition and allow generic versions to drive down costs.  https://t.co/sRn4RJ7ftf

I'm grateful for all of our brave law enforcement officers who put themselves in danger to keep our communities safe and especially those who have lost their lives in the line of duty. Thank you for your service to Southwest Michigan! https://t.co/dJpfWeDb2v
Drug prices are too expensive for too many Americans. I'm working across the aisle to find bipartisan solutions that will help make medications and treatments more affordable. https://t.co/QjatvUTMJh

Honored to welcome my friend and colleague @jackiewalorski to Southwest Michigan last night for the Cass County Lincoln Day Dinner. We’re working hard together to protect American jobs American businesses and American workers! 🇺🇸#MI06 https://t.co/VHLzWGOe3d
Fun time at the Holland Tulip Time Muziekparade on Saturday! Great to see so many people - Largest crowd of Tulip Time! #MI06 https://t.co/6oiYGcyVLR

I'm fighting to ensure there are no cuts made to Medicare and Medicaid and that community-based services like Meals on Wheels and caregiver support are reauthorized through the Older Americans Act this year.  https://t.co/0Y5bng6fKp
Great to have @MIGOPChair in Southwest Michigan for the Berrien County Lincoln Day dinner! Appreciate you coming to #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/aEbebaaNex

It is an honor to receive the Spirit of Enterprise Award for my 100% score from the U.S. Chamber of Commerce in 2018. I will always support bipartisan policies that spur job growth grow the economy and deliver real results for southwest Michigan! https://t.co/OhrC4CVg91

On Gold Star Spouses Day I want to thank not only the service men and women who gave their lives for our country but the families they left behind. I am grateful for your sacrifice! https://t.co/ars3PNPEcD

The Soo Locks are vital to thousands of jobs and major industries in Michigan. I was proud to join some of my colleagues from the Great Lake states in signing a letter of support for funding to maintain the infrastructure of this critical waterway. https://t.co/MUqbfztZzS
We need to strengthen our border to keep Americans safe. I will always work to find solutions to secure our border within in the bounds of the Constitution. https://t.co/3wwm8jVxOZ
Fun time at the St. Patrick’s Day parade in Kalamazoo! Thanks to everyone who came out. Great turnout even with the cold weather. https://t.co/kA9p1DFBVc
Proud to celebrate the extraordinary achievements and contributions to our communities and nation made by women throughout history. #IWD2019 https://t.co/1Z2HcgsGr8
Had the pleasure of welcoming newly elected @MIGOPChair Laura Cox to the annual 6th District Mardi Gras event last night. Great turnout - enjoyed seeing so many friends! #MI06 https://t.co/sBwHv82fuV
